languages.text: "Мне бы стоило казнить тебя на месте за подобное предложение. Твой груз — грязная ксеноересь!"
"I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"
languages.original_text: "Мне бы стоило казнить тебя на месте за подобное предложение. Твой груз — грязная ксеноересь!"

traits.locale_text: "I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"
"I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"
"I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"
"I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"

languages.text: “你竟敢提出这样的提议，我真应该把你当场处决才对！你所说的货物，不过是异形那些脏东西罢了！”
languages.original_text: "I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢提出这样的提议，我真应该把你当场处决才对！你所说的货物，不过是异形那些脏东西罢了！”

languages.text: «¡Debería hacer que le ejecuten por la sugerencia! ¡Su cargamento no es más que vil xenoherejía!».
languages.original_text: "I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Debería hacer que le ejecuten por la sugerencia! ¡Su cargamento no es más que vil xenoherejía!».

languages.text: 「そのような提案をしたお前をこの場で処刑すべきだ！お前の貨物は、汚らわしき異端以外の何物でもない！」
languages.original_text: "I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「そのような提案をしたお前をこの場で処刑すべきだ！お前の貨物は、汚らわしき異端以外の何物でもない！」

languages.text: « Je devrais vous exécuter sur-le-champ pour avoir osé faire une telle suggestion ! Votre marchandise n'est rien que de la xénohérésie ! »
languages.original_text: "I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"

traits.locale_text: « Je devrais vous exécuter sur-le-champ pour avoir osé faire une telle suggestion ! Votre marchandise n'est rien que de la xénohérésie ! »

languages.text: "Ich hätte Euch allein für den Vorschlag augenblicklich hinrichten lassen sollen! Eure Fracht ist nichts als schändliche Xeno-Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: "I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte Euch allein für den Vorschlag augenblicklich hinrichten lassen sollen! Eure Fracht ist nichts als schändliche Xeno-Ketzerei!"

languages.text: "Bu teklifin için seni şuracıkta kurşuna dizdirsem yeridir! Kargo dediğin, iğrenç zeno kâfirlikleri!"
languages.original_text: "I should have you executed on the spot for such a suggestion! Your cargo is nothing but foul xenoheresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu teklifin için seni durduğun yerde kurşuna dizsem yeridir! Kargo dediğin, sırf iğrenç zeno kâfirliklerinden ibaret!"
